titleStmt.title: Via intelligentiæ a sermom [sic] preached to the University of Dublin : shewing by what means the scholars shall become most learned and most usefull : published at their desire / by ... Jeremy, Lord Bishop of Downe, &c. ...
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
